question: The UN World Tourism Organization recently released its ‘UNWTO World Tourism Barometer report’. Where is the head-quarters of UNWTO located?
explanation:
The UN World Tourism Organization (UNWTO) is the United Nations Agency for promoting sustainable tourism, which is head-quartered at Madrid, Spain.
UNWTO recently released its comprehensive report on global tourism titled ‘UNWTO World Tourism Barometer report’. According to the report, 1.5 billion international tourist arrivals were recorded in the year 2019, around the globe. This is an increase of 4% from the previous year and this is also the tenth consecutive year recording growth. It also predicted a growth of 3% to 4% in tourism sector, for the year 2020.
